item.title: A Study of Plasticity Loss in On-Policy Deep Reinforcement Learning
item.description: On-policy deep RL agents suffer from plasticity loss, but this paper introduces ‘regenerative’ methods that consistently mitigate this, improving performance in challenging environments.

item.title: Accuracy is Not All You Need
item.description: LLM compression accuracy hides crucial behavioral changes; use % flips and KL-divergence for better evaluation.

item.title: Adam with model exponential moving average is effective for nonconvex optimization
item.description: Clipped Adam with EMA achieves optimal convergence rates for smooth and non-smooth nonconvex optimization, particularly when scales vary across different coordinates.

item.title: Advancing Spiking Neural Networks for Sequential Modeling with Central Pattern Generators
item.description: Bio-inspired CPG-PE enhances spiking neural networks’ sequential modeling by efficiently encoding position information, outperforming conventional methods across various tasks.

item.title: ALPINE: Unveiling The Planning Capability of Autoregressive Learning in Language Models
item.description: ALPINE reveals how Transformer-based LLMs learn planning by embedding graph information into their weights, but also highlights their inability to handle transitive relationships.

item.title: CultureLLM: Incorporating Cultural Differences into Large Language Models
item.description: CultureLLM, a new approach, effectively incorporates cultural nuances into LLMs using semantic data augmentation, significantly outperforming existing models.

item.title: CulturePark: Boosting Cross-cultural Understanding in Large Language Models
item.description: CulturePark, a novel multi-agent communication framework, generates high-quality cross-cultural data to fine-tune LLMs, significantly reducing cultural bias and boosting cross-cultural understanding.

item.title: EEG2Video: Towards Decoding Dynamic Visual Perception from EEG Signals
item.description: EEG2Video reconstructs dynamic videos from EEG signals, achieving 79.8% accuracy in semantic classification and 0.256 SSIM in video reconstruction.

item.title: ElasTST: Towards Robust Varied-Horizon Forecasting with Elastic Time-Series Transformer
item.description: ElasTST: A novel time-series transformer enables robust forecasting across various horizons without per-horizon training, enhancing adaptability and accuracy.

item.description: Deep Equilibrium Models (DEQs) infused into DFT Hamiltonian prediction achieves self-consistency, accelerating large-scale materials simulations.

item.title: Multimodal Large Language Models Make Text-to-Image Generative Models Align Better
item.description: AI-generated preference data improves text-to-image alignment.

item.title: Online Estimation via Offline Estimation: An Information-Theoretic Framework
item.description: This paper introduces a novel information-theoretic framework, showing how to convert offline into online estimation algorithms efficiently, impacting interactive decision-making.

item.title: Protecting Your LLMs with Information Bottleneck
